summary.description: > NAME (QUBIC2) SIMILAR TO (PUB. DIFFERENT) bio.tools/qubic (QUBIC) | A novel and robust biclustering algorithm for analyses and interpretation of large-scale RNA-Seq data | A novel biclustering algorithm for analyses of transcriptomic data | QUBIC2 is a novel biclustering algorithm for analyses of gene expression data from bulk and single-cell RNA-Sequencing. This introductory vignette provides an overview of installation and usage
summary.name: QUBIC2
